channel.title: Hello on ownCloud
channel.description: Recent content in Hello on ownCloud

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Installation Docker Binaries Configuration Envrionment variables Global Server Health Commandline flags Global Server Health Configuration file Usage Server Health Metrics Installation So far we are offering two different variants for the installation. You can choose between Docker or pre-built binaries which are stored on our download mirrors and GitHub releases.

item.title: Building
item.description: Frontend Backend As this project is built with Go and NodeJS, so you need to install that first. The installation of Go and NodeJS is out of the scope of this document, please follow the official documentation for Go, NodeJS and Yarn, to build this project you have to install Go >= v1.13. After the installation of the required tools you need to get the sources:

item.title: License
item.description: This project is licensed under the Apache 2.0 license. For the license of the used libraries you have to check the respective sources.
